name: Rauora

biography.description: Rauora uses her D.O.M. Panel Launcher to deploy bulletproof panels from a distance, strategically controlling the flow of combat. With a quick trigger at the top of the door, she can open or close the panel to create tactical opportunities.

gameplayTips: Deploy panels to block or control enemy movements across the map.
Use the panels as cover when advancing or planting the defuser.
Open and close panels strategically to surprise enemies or provide temporary cover for teammates.
Combine with smoke grenades for effective area control and visibility manipulation.
